name: zkmonero
description: ZK-proof that a Monero payment happened

scripts.build: npm run build:circuits && npm run build:client
scripts.build:client: tsc client/proveMoneroPayment.ts --outDir dist --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node
scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup circuits/monero_payment.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_10.ptau circuits/monero_payment.pk
scripts.zkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey circuits/monero_payment.pk circuits/monero_payment.vk

author: ZKMonero contributors
